  • Method Details

    • retrieveDocument

      String retrieveDocument(String poolId, String documentId) throws IOException
      Retrieve document from Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool that the document belongs to
      documentId - the id of the document
      Returns:
      String of the document data
      Throws:
      IOException

    • retrieveDocuments

      Map<String,String> retrieveDocuments(String poolId, List<String> documentIds) throws IOException
      Retrieve multiple documents from Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool that the documents belong to
      documentIds - the document ids of the documents to retrieve
      Returns:
      a map of document ids to the corresponding document data
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getDocumentMetadatas

      DocumentMetadataDto[] getDocumentMetadatas(String poolId) throws IOException
      Get document metadatas from Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool that the document metadatas belong to
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getDocumentMetadata

      DocumentMetadataDto getDocumentMetadata(String poolId, String documentId) throws IOException
      Get document metadata from Integration Data Manager
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool that the document metadata belong to
      documentId - the document id of the document metadata to retrieve
      Returns:
      json metadata for documentId
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getDocumentMetadatasPage

      DocumentMetadatasPageDto getDocumentMetadatasPage(String poolId, Integer pageLimit, Boolean forward, String cursor) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createDocument

      String createDocument(String poolId, Integer schemaVersion, String content, String searchKey) throws IOException
      Create document in Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool in which to create the document
      schemaVersion - the schema version of the document
      content - the document data
      searchKey - the document search key (required)
      Returns:
      String of the document id
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getDocumentsBySearchKey

      DocumentSearchResultPage getDocumentsBySearchKey(String poolId, String searchKey, Integer pageLimit, Boolean forward, String cursor) throws IOException
      Create document in Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool in which to create the document
      searchKey - the search key of the document
      pageLimit - the maximum number of items that will be in the page in the response
      forward - whether the request is for the next items or the previous items
      cursor - the cursor for pagination
      Returns:
      page of the document search results
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteDocuments

      void deleteDocuments(String poolId) throws IOException
      Delete documents in Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool to delete documents from
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addFlexistoreReference

      void addFlexistoreReference(FlexistoreReference flexistoreReference, String poolId, String documentId)
      Adds poolId and documentId to FlexistoreReference
      Parameters:
      flexistoreReference - flexi store aware entity in InsuranceSuite
      poolId - the pool to associate with flexistore reference
      documentId - the documentId to associate with flexistore reference

    • retrieveFlexistoreContentByReference

      String retrieveFlexistoreContentByReference(FlexistoreReference flexistoreReference) throws IOException
      Retrieves document from Flexistore by FlexistoreReference
      Parameters:
      flexistoreReference - flexi store aware entity in InsuranceSuite
      Returns:
      String of the document data
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteDocument

      void deleteDocument(String poolId, String documentId) throws IOException
      Delete document by documentId from Flexistore
      Parameters:
      poolId - the pool that the document belongs to
      documentId - the id of the document
      Throws:
      IOException
